website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for the illuminator function and photo/video production, but not the best choice if clear viewing distance is your priority.
pros: in addition to blue infrared illuminator, it produces images and videos
cons: Not quite as reliable as other models when it comes to sharp images at long distances

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Do not believe the product description nor the pictures associated with it. I used it in a non-artificial light environment and could not see past 30 feet and was supposed to see 100m. No way. I used it one (1) night and sent it back. Not for hunters or those wanting to use it in the woods away from any light source.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hanville

customer_reviews.title: An excellent, entry level NV viewer
customer_reviews.text: Entry level night vision. Don't expect a SEAL to rave about it but don't pass it over as junk either. With just the lightest light source -- moon, street light, I can see fairly good detail. The built in illumination produces a visible red glow which would show up like a beacon to someone else using NV so just keep that in mind. Learn the simple controls and practice them because you can't see them in the dark. I found that the optical adjustment is very handy since I wear glasses.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: and the night vision is extremely poor optics with visibility only at close range [20-30 feet]
customer_reviews.text: this item does not work as shown on the video. The IR didn't work at all, and the night vision is extremely poor optics with visibility only at close range [20-30 feet]. Anything further out was so blurry you couldn't tell what it was. I had hoped to use this to view wildlife in my back yard at night out to 50-75 ft or more, and I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like reviews state, returned 2nd day
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like reviews state. You can't see well AT ALL. Tried 2 different sets of batteries. Not to mention the IR gives of a piercing high pitch noise as you increase the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: A bit grainy with low resolution. But it does an amazing job of letting you see in dark unlit alleys and into deep shadows. The picture taking is a nice feature. Better if used in total darkness. Great little night vision camera for the money. I am a grave yard shift armed security guard in a bad section of town, it helps keep me safe. I see people before they see me. I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty neat; definitely comparable to older technology
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty neat; definitely comparable to older technology. Still, for the price it gives you good low light and IR viewing capabilities. My only caveat is that it will destroy the night vision in which ever eye you look though the lens with. I've had fun with it so far. The critters bothering the chicken coop and rabbit pen had better be on the look out from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy G

customer_reviews.title: Quality is better than I expected for sure
customer_reviews.text: I love it my mother-in-law wanted it for Mother's Day so we all pitched in and bought it for her. When she tried it out her jaw dropped. The quality is even better than the reviews in which I had read and watched before ordering this. Everything is crisp and clear the only thing is that something that is white looks completely white because of the infrared however you can still make out what it is and the different levels of infared is really nice when you're trying to look far away we live on some property and it is just perfect. doesnt record sound but who needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Adelyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not so much...
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend, spend a little more on a better quality binocular. My husband was not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: C-
customer_reviews.text: These work as advertised but the range is a bit week. The video eye piece is quite grainy as is the video. Perhaps I should have spend a bit more $ to see if there was a better one out there.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Returned Promptly.
customer_reviews.text: Not Good- Used them inn total darkness and for the most part that is what I saw, darkness, if near a light source you might see a couple of things fairly clear if you lucky but for the most part it was nothing or very grainy which is pretty much useless, I didn't expect real high quality or even high quality but I did expect them to work as described, they did not and it wasn't do to operator error
customer_reviews.author: SECRET SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool For Seeing At Night
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful tool for seeing in complete darkness. Whether you hunt, or simply just watch wildlife in their night-life, this is a must have. I have had other so-called night vision monoculars/binoculars, and none can compete with this one, especially at this price! This is an excellent monocular with a great IR function that will not cost you a fortune! I can easily see 300+ yards with this thing in complete dark!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Very low grade quality tiny viewing angle and night vision ...
customer_reviews.text: Very low grade quality tiny viewing angle and night vision didn't really work. returned and looking for something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great product, jut keep in mind.....
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great product. It works just as promised and it is amazing to see everything at night really well. The only thing everyone needs to remember is that if looking out your window where there is a street light on, it will not let you see your night vision. Any light anywhere near you will hinder your view greatly.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: would not reach to the end of my driveway.could only make out things up close
customer_reviews.author: ED CARR

customer_reviews.title: Works as described but eyes suffer after just 2-3 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: This device will hurt your eyes. It is like lookining into a flashlight. Every one I let use it have it back and said their eyes hurt. I returned it. This night vision needs to be tested it is going to damage someone’s eyes permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Night Vision
customer_reviews.text: Freakin awesome. Read all the positive and negative reviews before purchase cause the price seemed almost too good for night vision. I live in a neighborhood so when I got the monocular I blacked out the house at night and shut off all sources of light. Turned this bad boy on and I could see EVERYTHING. Can't wait to use it out in the woods. Very happy with purchase especially at the price. Shipped securely and came with a bunch of neat stuff. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Walker

customer_reviews.title: This is on par with Gen 1 device
customer_reviews.text: I used Gen 1 night vision 28 years ago in one of European armies. This device is pretty much it. The same picture quality, the same eye blinding experience. Bonus is that I can record and it is very cheap. You can easily see a dear at 20-30 meters (22 - 33 yards) and if the night is bright enough you don't need IR illumination. Illumination is nice and small but if somebody really looks hard, can see it from 20 meters or so. If you want cheap Gen 1 device that works I recommend this. Keep your expectations in line with price and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: amy1373

customer_reviews.title: A fun and inexpensive toy
customer_reviews.text: Very fun toy with a great cost/benefit ratio. I call it a toy because, let's get real, this ain't true night vision, BUT... It is easy to use, the IR is kinda discrete so using it is not like using a flashlight at night, it has a decent build and it seems it does indeed may have some light amplifying capabilities as I pointed the device to the sky and I was able to see some starts in a thinly clouded night not visible to the naked eye. So for $129 amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I really did not expect much due to the low price, but was I wrong. I put myself in a totally darkened room and turned on the infared option and could see everything that was in the room. This is a great addition to my SHTF preparation!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay focused
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the price, I was quite taken aback with how well the unit performed, initially. Please note, that this unit incessantly, aggravatingly loses focus, and loses it by enough that it is rendered useless. The focus dial seems badly placed, feels cheap (cycles excessively easily, and does not remain fixed for long). In addition to the operation and placement of the focus, I considered it to be undersized and restricted. I repeatedly lost focus on my subject, fidgeting with the unit and found I was spending more time looking at the unit, than looking through it. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camcorder with night vision- meh
customer_reviews.text: Basically it’s a camcorder with night vision. You can “zoom” in and look at it kind of blurrier. Like a camcorder. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Great little device, especially for the price. It doesn't work well if you forget to remove the daytime cover (I've done that a few times) but is a pretty clear picture in very low light and the IR works good in total darkness. Wish there was a way to mount to headgear so it could be hands free. I didn't buy it for pics so I haven't tried that yet but will just to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: CWK

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this thing is legit! I will say if you're yote hunting I would get a IR illuminator, it will help it longer range and both together are cheaper and effective as other night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pair that Truly works in the DARK
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair that Truly works in the DARK... Yay, now I can give these to my Grandson. I have purchased 2 other brands before these they didn't work in the dark. Believable... That they can legally advertise Night Vision because they work in low light. With 8 Grand Children we will purchase more of these..Plus for us. They are everything ADVERTISED and MORE I want a Pair for myself. Works great looking outside in the Dark Walking the Fur Baby
customer_reviews.author: Cindy & Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works better than higher priced units.
customer_reviews.text: Out of 3 night vision devices, this is the only one that has worked for me. To other brands didn't work on arrival. The first one had the lens fall out after the warranty was barely over, but the company (SOLOMARK) stood by it, and sent me a new one. The other two I purchased were more exspensive, but would not focus. Now this is no gen 2 or 3, it's digital, but it does the job, and is well worth the money. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Haddo

customer_reviews.title: Hardware and Firmware a little Beta
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. No way to set the date or time, which comes up as 2016/01/01 00:00 when you put the batteries in, and is embedded in any photos you take but not in the videos, so if you work security you definitely want to collect any 'evidence' in video mode. The eyepiece adjusting slide switch is stuck or been glued in place. I wear reading glasses and have to wear them to view the image clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sarvis

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present for my 8 year old son, as he had been asking for some for almost a year prior. We both have been extremely happy with them. I am sure that in comparison to much pricier/higher quality devices, they would be considered amateur, but since they are only for pleasure not hunting, etc. they are more than enough for him. I am excited to use them on the mountain in the spring/summer!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany777

customer_reviews.title: not bad. I needed short distance viewing and this seems ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price,not bad. I needed short distance viewing and this seems to be the only one that does it at a low price. long distance viewing requires the circuitry to stabilize for a second or two for clarity. battery life seems good. the focus ring is economy grade but works well. To view in darkness, especially if you are viewing thru a window,you need to remove lens filter cover. if you don't need to view less then 30 feet or so and want good long distance and a better, crisper,much faster stabilizing of long distance images, i recommend the bestguarder 6x50 at $250. it is twice the price, but 3x better.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: These monoculars are fair at best.
customer_reviews.text: These monoculars are fair at best. Picture quality is only fair, very grainy. Marginal for viewing larger objects. Picture at night washes out completely, especially if your watching a vehicle and its lights are on. Picture has NO detail capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: TLTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fun work great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my family to view all the wildlife around us. There was some deer in the field pitch black out and did not know they were there until I.looked through the goggles. Takes time.to get use to all the buttons and what they do. Took video was really good quality. With the money and would recommend to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Horse lover

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Narrow field of view lens makes it hard to aim down an object. Back light is too bright even in lowest setting, which will cause eye problems. Picture quality is grainy. I had to return it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this thing. It exceeds my expectations. Lots of fun. If you think you are getting military grade you're not (it's close) you'll need to spend a lot more money but for the price this is great.
customer_reviews.author: V Lagneaux

customer_reviews.title: Great value, operation, and video options.
customer_reviews.text: Looked for economical options and decided to purchase this unit based upon many positive reviews, glad I did. We use this out in the country to keep an eye on the wildlife and our "adopted" racoons and deer. In no light conditions, we have no problems seeing into the hedgerows 100 yards away. We like the video option on this too, and convert the Avi files to mp4 on the PC for sharing. Absolutely a good value for the money. Non-compensated review to boot, purchased outright.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these because it was not the quality I paid for. One of the things that bothered me besides picture quality, was that it clicked so loudly when zooming in and out. If I'm in the dark trying to see I may want to be discreet no?
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Schulte

customer_reviews.title: This is $120 night vision you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with the purchase it's a decent unit for the money spent. It's older technology so it won't be nice and crisp viewing you can see maybe 20-30'. It lasted for about 2 yrs and then the picture quality went downhill. Black spots began to appear and it doesn't want to stay in focus anymore so it's not reliable for tactical situations. I can still see any animals around me because their eyes will glow. That's all I need it for when walking my dog in the canyon at night. If you want a quality affordable scope get the Bushnell for 300.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take camping it's amazing to see whats out there after dark. They're first gen night optics, very good but don't expect mil grade. The function buttons are easy to orient. Will work under most low light conditions well. I do not find it heavy or awkward to use. Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not what I expected. This didn't work past my back yard in low light, and I have a tiny yard. Very small viewing window, picture quality is poor. It's more like a toy than quality night vision optical gear. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: justaguy

customer_reviews.title: The product does everything that it states. I do ...
customer_reviews.text: The product does everything that it states. I do wish it had a larger Zoom ratio. Would buy again. No regrets. Shipping was timely also
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pace

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: So this is bright but it’s bright in your eyes. Daytime pictures are fine but forget the night vision. Buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than I expected. I am particularly impressed with the low light feature,, nearly dark,, 30-45 minutes after sunset low light works very well as long as the amount of light doesn’t change much. I do concern myself with daylight lens cover detaching and not be able to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner unit
customer_reviews.text: These work great at fairly close range (40 yards or so). For the money I’m very pleased with these, lots of fun without the silly cost of professional quality. I will probably buy another set for a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Robert Aduddell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really top notch. Bought two for the men in my life this christmas and both have alot of these types of “toys” and were really impressed at the quality and capability
customer_reviews.author: Jinnie Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Nice Nite scope
customer_reviews.text: Like the finish and feel of item. For inexpensive night vision, this works. I purchased for wildlife viewing. Has built in IR illuminator that has amazing reach. Can see out behind the neighbors house. Even with a flashlight I can't see over there. So pretty cool. Also takes pictures. Smile bigfoot...
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: cool tool
customer_reviews.text: played with it . i need more practice too learn operations . 4 hours till sunset . cant wait hahas ok tried it out in complete darkness . i read the manual . works perfectly . amazing . worth more than the price !!!
customer_reviews.author: dalexalan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality viewfinder and photo quality even worse
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Poor quality viewfinder and photo quality even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Taildashf

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It took me a moment to figure out how to use it. The only drawback I see is that the screen is very bright and can blind you when you take it away and look into the night. I’ve seen spots before my eyes went back to seeing clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good night vision.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 5 stars because one: I can see with it in the dark, two: it can take photos and videos in the dark, three: battery life is very good, four: video and photo quality is ok for night vision, five: digital zoom is a plus. For the price it does a good job. I am looking forward to the improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: does not work as expected. marked off every 50 feet to see how the distance works at night. seems like you need a lot of moonlight for it to get past 50 feet. but it is only one with magnification that is available to ship to california.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: With the 32 gig chip it works perfectly and gives great night videos
customer_reviews.text: This came with a four gig chip and kept having recording. It would record about two minutes then stop. I tried other chips and stuck to four gig ones. I was about to give up but for some reason opened a new 32 gig chip I had, and I haven't had any trouble with it since. With the 32 gig chip it works perfectly and gives great night videos.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Church

customer_reviews.title: Works great and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Coolest gadet I have ever owned. Works great and as advertised. I would recommend a handheld IR extender of you wish to see in detail past 80 yards. Saw a deer eating on a bait pile but could not make out of it had antlers at 80 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Works beyond expectations, I really enjoy this binocular for looking at animals during night hours! The Only "bad" setting is that it is focused manually not automatic but it does not take but a few seconds to focus !
customer_reviews.author: John  S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan at all, subpar at best
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Bought it for hunting so I could see what goes on while in the blind waiting for the sun to come up The eye piece is so bright in your eye it’s takes several several minutes for the eye you are using to retransition back to your dark surroundings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of night vision
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this item for Christmas. After a little learning and tweaking I was told that these worked very well at night. The only issue that was had was if you use them too long your eyes tend to get pretty blurry for a little while. This was a great item and well described!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Garrison

customer_reviews.title: A truly great Night Vision Monocular
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Night Vision Monocular for the price. It is easy to use and also fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B. Trexler

customer_reviews.title: The Best for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'am totally please with this night vision Monocular by solomark. I always wanted something like this but the price was too high, until I saw this. The price is right and well worth it. It work beatifully in darkness and day light(with filter on). I recommand, this is the thing to buy if you want something for night vision. 100% awesome
customer_reviews.author: ken starkey

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I had a much older night vision monocular that did and does do a much better job. The view is extremly grainy to the point of hard to make out what you are looking at at 30 feet away. Stay away from this product if you want a good experience. Only reason I gave it any points at all is that it does come on and IF you have some idea of what you are looking at, you almost make out what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift and the receipent was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband for Christmas. I did some research and after watching some videos I picked these. They are real nice I've used them a few times my self.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Use in my bounty hunting and bail bond business . Very helpful at night. Saved us from being surprised by Meth Master Mike when we snuck up on his lab at night to serve a warrant
customer_reviews.author: General Woody

customer_reviews.title: Range is surprising
customer_reviews.text: Fun, works great. surprising how far you can see with the lights. A guess would be maybe 1500 feet. Image quality could be better, but for looking in those dark places it light up the night/
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Brown

customer_reviews.title: kids toys
customer_reviews.text: It was too small to see when you have to close 1 eye,,it's clear when you see completely dark but not long your eye will hurt,,very small maybe for kids 8-10+ not for adults...
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: e
customer_reviews.text: I loved at first till I tried to shut it off the second time I used. I found out the on/off button won't work. I can turn it on but off will not work. I can only shut it off by removing the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Man

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and 3 levels of intensity.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for a recent hunting trip. What an impressive item it turned out to be. I could not get the video to work with the SD card but the pictures were very clear. These photos were taken in complete darkness from a tree stand from 30 yards away. The time stamp is off only because I had not taken the time to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: cliffford25624

customer_reviews.title: Solomark Night Vision Monocular
customer_reviews.text: worst product on earth. One should never buy these substandard products. I wasted my money. Naked eyes are better than this nonsense stuff, even under darkness. Very substandard and total waste of money. Useless device. If there is a way a rate it, it is totally useless. Unfortunately and unless I put a start it does not take the review. It doesn't deserve even a 0.0000000001 start rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Display window in unit is relatively small
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Display window in unit is relatively small. Needed to return due to my negligence on how it works. My mother wanted to watch wildlife outside from in the house. The device projects light unseen by the human eye so when it hits a window it basically reflects like a mirror. Like I said in the beginning it did what it was supposed to when outside at night.
customer_reviews.author: eric0000

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for seeing the coyotes hunting your cats, but you must be outside for an unobstructed view. Also sees the red laser on my Ruger 10/22, allowing for a hip shot. They learn quick, have not returned.
customer_reviews.author: John Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews. The quality of the view through the lense is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage, no better night vision than my naked eyes.
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE, do not believe any positive reviews. I bought these as a gift for Christmas, tested them out before I gave them and they have no better night vision capabilities than my own eyes. I’m not exaggerating either, even with the IR button pressed. Do yourself a favor and don’t waste your time or money. Trust me, they are garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fox

customer_reviews.title: Cool purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these and has enjoyed them. He it impressed in the quality & easy of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R. Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Had for it 2 days and so far works like a charm. With slight moon light can see clearly without using IR and in complete darkness can see for about 300m with ir. Only complaint i have is the narrow field of view but isnt that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome night vision
customer_reviews.text: To bright of backlighting. Also the red ir light is bright on 3;which faces what you are looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Dont have much experiance with high end ones but this works good. Easy to set up and use. Pic quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: FF3216

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 15 min
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 15 min. then would not work again. The ir worked great. Has many great features. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform as advertised or even come close.
customer_reviews.text: This is a novelty item. It does not help to see at night at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tim medlin

customer_reviews.title: Its a decent night vision for the money. The pictures and clarity are a little grainey.
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent night vision for the money. The pictures and clarity are a little grainey, but as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It worked better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: It worked better than I thought it would. I can see 400 feet out my back door to my tree line really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have! It lets me see in the dark. Comes in very handy!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: For a "starter" night vision device, this met/exceeded expectations ...
customer_reviews.text: For a "starter" night vision device, this met/exceeded expectations. My son Ben, for whom it was purchased, noted it does exceptionally well in total darkness, allowing viewing for several hundred feet, plenty to cover what we wanted to view. We live on a river and "things" come up and down trails at night. The images in total darkness are very vivid and clear for a device which was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: James OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product.i have been using it for a few months and it's been very handy.great deal for the price.images are not that crisp but hey it gets the job done for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Go for the best. Forget the rest.
customer_reviews.text: I had another night vision device. It was great until I got this little number. It was as if I had been blind and now I could see. I let brother have my old one. It looked a lot cooler, but wasn't even close in video or night vision clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Wright

customer_reviews.title: Close range ability only-Reading distance
customer_reviews.text: Husband tried it. Only good for reading a book (close range). Very disappointing considering all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Absolute piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Just not worth it. if you really want night vision, pay the bucks and look for something like Aurora.
customer_reviews.author: Cann

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! The lighting is fantastic, and we love that it records still images as well as videos. Terrific value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Performs well and does what it says. It is good to get to know all the buttons before you take it out at night so you can easily make adjustments. I am happy with my unit! Good unit for the money. The strap broke the first time I used it, otherwise so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: movie mama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable. Good enough for all around day and night video camera. Zooms better than I expected. The infrared light is only visible if you look directly at the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Berger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are very high quality, my husband uses them for coyote hunting.You can see every movement in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Penny N.

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like these. Seem to be just an expensive toy. Really can see well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy and friends thought they were pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Very neat, used while camping/hunting. Enjoy and friends thought they were pretty cool. Do not expect military quality.
customer_reviews.author: cahill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Compared to similar products I considered this was by far the best value. It works as advertised and is priced fairly.
customer_reviews.author: RDL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for night recon.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent use for "checking out" noises in the night, can probably see further than the manufacturer claims.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome!! is super usefull to see in the darkest nigth.... long distance ir ligth.... i love it

customer_reviews.title: For the price you cannot beat them.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who gets to use real NVG's at work I was really impressed with how well these work for the price. My husband loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as advertised! And thank you to whomever posted the video.

customer_reviews.title: For the price the best you can get
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding piece of equipment I couldn't be happier for a bargain priced night scope it satisfies all my requirements thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for price!
customer_reviews.text: Can see really well with it in pitch black dark. Love it.

customer_reviews.text: Had to send them back. Wasn’t satisfied with any of it.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great gadget for the price ex Infantry soldier tested

customer_reviews.text: Amazing image quality for the price- I keep another pair on my boat- why pay thousands for FLIR?

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality hard to see as it claims.You get what you pay for. Good for party novelty.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking at night vision for years but the prices are so high. This was a great buy and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Marshall

product_meta.title: Solomark Night Vision Monocular, Blue-Infrared Illuminator Allows Viewing in The Dark - Records Images and Video
feature_bullets: A great gadget which enable you to observe target in complete darkness. Ideal for a wide variety of uses such as surveillance, nighttime hunting wildlife observation and exploring caves.
With multi-coated glass objectives, high sensitivity sensor, integrated color LCD-Screen and 3level IR LED illuminator. You can view in the dark up to 328ft/100m, get the brightness you want.

Take photos and videos at any time, record more true-to-life details. Also it’s easy to display images and videos on the television and transfer files to a computer, which enables you to share fun with your family and friends.
Handy and safe —Can be mounted on a tripod, Put into a bag, or linked to a binocular harness. It is covered by rubber on the outface, which gains more friction, not easy to slip out.

Notice: Regarding the way to open the battery case, you can check photos .Two Year Limited Warranty. Comes with 8GB micro SD card, mini USB cable, AV cable, neck strap and soft carrying case. Requires 4xAA batteries (not included).
